body:
So, I am super excited because I may have just had a life changing event happen to me. I got in contact with a person who personally knows big youtubers such as Preston, Logdotzip, and TheRedEngineer. I got in contact with this guy to make maps and stuff. Furthermore, this guy is in and may add me to a group chat with the top of the line command blockers such as like Sethbling


I having been going with my primarily command block YouTube channel for like a year with no growth. This is my opportunity to get my name out!

And this is probably going to get locked for personal updates.

title: My Big Break
